title: Gandrel's Aspiration
content:
Gandrel's Aspiration Uncommon 2~11 Damage 1d10 +1 Piercing Feller of Monsters: You have Advantage against Monstrosity type enemies. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: When Gandrel was seven, he was frightened badly by a vampire spawn during a public burning. Seized by the flames, the creature didn't shrivel up. It swelled and burst. Heavy Crossbow 18m Two-Handed 8.1 130
